member.name: D3D12_FORMAT_SUPPORT2
member.summary: Specifies which unordered resource options are supported for a provided format.

member.name: D3D12_FORMAT_SUPPORT2.D3D12_FORMAT_SUPPORT2_NONE
member.summary: No unordered resource options are supported.

member.name: D3D12_FORMAT_SUPPORT2.D3D12_FORMAT_SUPPORT2_UAV_ATOMIC_COMPARE_STORE_OR_COMPARE_EXCHANGE
member.summary: Format supports atomic compare with store or exchange.

member.name: D3D12_FORMAT_SUPPORT2.D3D12_FORMAT_SUPPORT2_UAV_ATOMIC_SIGNED_MIN_OR_MAX
member.summary: Format supports atomic min and max.

member.name: D3D12_FORMAT_SUPPORT2.D3D12_FORMAT_SUPPORT2_UAV_ATOMIC_UNSIGNED_MIN_OR_MAX
member.summary: Format supports atomic unsigned min and max.

member.name: D3D12_FORMAT_SUPPORT2.D3D12_FORMAT_SUPPORT2_OUTPUT_MERGER_LOGIC_OP
member.summary: Format supports logic operations in blend state.

member.name: D3D12_FORMAT_SUPPORT2.D3D12_FORMAT_SUPPORT2_TILED
member.summary: Format supports tiled resources. Refer to Volume Tiled Resources.
